descs.desc: Mod for my OC Summer Jade, containing appearance, EGO, and a correlated Abnormality Produced by：书呆ShouldI（语冰） Special Thanks： Plana, Yukimitsu(ykmt) , Andre, CNGE, Chess , and HengMING who guided me in the process of writing codes Mr. WanQing and Amir who guided me during the animation process. fufu who helped me in the mapping process. LincyDream, who encouraged me during the project and production of the mod. Min who helped me to connect for translate. PowerUp(EN)、Deiasis(JP) and Pomeran(KR) who helped me to translate. And every single one of you who used this mod.
